channel.title: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011
channel.description:
I have a PhD to finish. If you release it before September 2011, there's no chance. None. Does the dev team want that on their conscience? Me, dead in a ditch having choked to death on my own bitterness?
So whatever you do - no release before Sept '11. Deal?

item.title: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Remind me of that song “We love you, Doctor Freeman.”

Read full topic

MysticJ:

It will take 12 hours to finish playing the mod. You’ve spent many times more time on these forums, and you will, till the release, spend many times more time on these forums, so actually, releasing the mod would be doing you a favor.

(shh, I’m trying to reverse de-psychologa-mize 'em… On the basis that demanding an immediate release pushes back the release date, demanding it be later should bring it nearer, yes? But don’t tell anyone…)

item.title: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I have an idea for the OP, if he was being serious:

Add this to your HOSTS file:

127.0.0.1 blackmesasource.com

And keep it there until you’re done with your schooling. Then, you can remove it and download. Problem solved!

(In fact, even if he is joking, I still suggest that. )

Read full topic

item.title: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
2011 is too early. I need to get my degree and PhD thesis too. And marry. And have children. I suggest you release 2022. By that time I have everything I need educational wise, my first wife left me with our children, and I can counter my depression by replaying BMS 100 times, before marrying a former prostitute and opening a small shop at the beach near Bordeaux that sells the best god damn sandwiches ever made.

Please?

Read full topic
item.source: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011

item.title: Under no circumstances should BM be released before September 2011

item.description:
Maverix26:

You guys release it before sep. 2011, you hear? I think having the devs announce that they will be releasing this year, solely because of this thread would bring a shit load of troll threads.
1.Find Troll thread
2.laugh your ass off from the shitposting
3.???
4.Profit

amidoinitrite?

Edit:Waiting a year, but getting a butt load of shit threads for me to flame along the way wouldn’y be totally worth it

Fix’d
